lenders.name: John Trosko
lenders.loan_because:
I am a small fish in a big pond.  I know how difficult it is to g-r-o-w your business without working capital, even just a little here and there.

I've had the fortunate opportunity to have friends lend me money at different (and sometimes critical) stages of my business. Some were small loans, and some were large loans.  It all adds up and I've repaid them and worked even harder than before.

For now, I am checking out Kiva to see how I can help.  Looking to help people who want to be more productive and save time so their business can grow.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am Los Angeles-based professional organizer, blogger, business owner and contributing author.

My consulting firm helps clients be better organized and more productive in their homes and businesses and manages relocations. Many of our clients have projects that they simply want done for them.  An equal part of the business are folks who want the "skill" of organizing transfered to them. We teach these people how to make decisions, break projects down into small managable chunks and provide extraordinary motivation so they keep themselves on track.

I am a two-term president of the Los Angeles chapter of the National Association of Professional Organizers (NAPO-LA) and am also a member of the International Association for Private Service Professionals (IAPSP).

Born and raised in Princeton, New Jersey, I've been a resident of Los Angeles for nearly 15 years.  I've got a background in creative organizational management, public relations and arts administration.

lenders.occupational_info:
I have exhaustively researched, tried and reviewed some of the more popular work from home programs, and the results are here for you to see. There are hundreds, if not thousands of different get rich quick programs and we hope our reviews help in filtering out the bad and pointing you to the good.

So before you invest your hard earned money on one of those luring ‘Get Rich Quick ’ products, be sure to read our work from home reviews.

lenders.name: Evolving Planet
lenders.loan_because: Evolving Planet is a non-profit organization dedicated to preserving the human race. The purpose for the Evolving Planet movement is for humans to understand we are living in a changing and ever evolving universe. Planet Earth encounters many changes and humans are affected in positive and negative ways. To preserve the balance, Evolving Planet movement's objective is to give financial support and aid to all organizations dedicated for a positive cause for humanity. These causes are meant to provide help to victims in need of assistance globally.
lenders.occupational_info:
Evolving Planet - Preserving The Human Race

Programs:
Free World Education Online Program from (K-12th grade) sponsored by MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Science) using Microsoft Cloud Interface.

Housing For Battered Women and Victims of Domestic Violence
sponsored by SEWA Inc.(Social Economic Welfare for All) in Trinidad and Tobago and the University of West Indies (Trinidad).

Microlending Platform in collaboration with Kiva.org portal for small businesses in developing nations that support the United States Government.

Sustainable Energy Technology Research and Development Team
sponsored by Platinum International Holding Corporation and The University of West Indies (Trinidad).

World Food Bank Public Trust Fund for Victims of Natural Disasters Globally establishing January 2011 by Evolving Planet Public Trust.

lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am without emprego.Mas, I have much experience with computers and recycling of cartridges for printers much and believe that recycling can generate income for my família.Preciso implement some features to win customers.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: It matters ...
lenders.occupational_info: Banking

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Everyone should.

lenders.name: Lola
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to reach their highest potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make the world a better place. My paid-for work is writing about America's health care system. My happy-to-do-it-for-free work is fighting racism in the U.S. and looking for solutions to poverty in rural Nicaragua.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I learn how to make the world a better place!

lenders.name: Elizabeth Jordan
lenders.loan_because: someone's gotta do it! Might as well be me!

lenders.name: doki
lenders.occupational_info: https://www.facebook.com/playvegan

lenders.name: APAK
lenders.loan_because: we want to share our love to the world!

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I have to make a difference. Twenty five dollars might be small to some, but it can also mean a world of positive change to most.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to better their lives and family.

lenders.name: Candice
lenders.loan_because: i got a gift card
lenders.occupational_info: idk. im just a kid

lenders.name: Rodrigo Dias
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make an exchange to learn English (I used a translator for this message)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, I work for scholarship support me here in college.

lenders.name: Estie
lenders.loan_because: After seeing a documentary on KQED I was moved to help. I try to increase my loan amount each month by $25.00. I have my own pile of  bills and expenses but this small amount is easy for me to part with and hopefully makes a big difference to someone else.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Many times in my life, small amounts of money have made a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps people invest. My job is to make our advice easy to understand.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: DONALD BRAMMS
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe that to be happy, one must  give others a chance or even better happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform mind Numbing manual labor.  I know what it is to work hard and have little.  I have more then most because I live in a wealthy country.  I want to help people that work hard,  but get even less reward.  At least I can help someone like myself achieve some sense of satifation and maybe even the sense of happiness if not for ever: perhaps for a while.

lenders.name: Chaudhary
lenders.loan_because: I am an retired person of 60 years old  and cannot afford my family expenses. Want to establish a dairy/goat farm for which i am looking for loans. Will be thankful to kiva and its team if they could help me in getting the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I have land the basic requirement for the subject purpose. Only need money to purchase the animals and to arrange water and other facilities. will start the project with minimum quantity  i mean 5 bufellos and 20 goats  and will increase slowly slowly.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I like to see my money at work.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans can help alleviate poverty worldwide.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the dignity of humankind and in Kiva's wonderful way of preserving that dignity for entrepreneurs who just need a little help in getting started.

lenders.name: enrique
lenders.loan_because: My parents came from a poor part of Mexico and lived a very impoverished childhood, and I understand that I am very lucky to not be in the same situation they were once in.  I wish to help others who are in that situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend college full time in hopes of becoming an ED doctor. I also currently work at the Kern Medical Center helping with research that helps better the practice of Emergency Medicine.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: A small amount from me can help to make a world of difference for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain the information our company uses to help businesses and schools save energy.

lenders.name: DLC Sunday School
lenders.loan_because: We are called to share our gifts.

lenders.name: nancy and paul schleich
lenders.loan_because: we do good without god

lenders.name: Devon
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the principle of empowering people across the globe.

lenders.name: Jennie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people and giving people opportunities to become more and contribute more to our world is important.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a small business in a very small town.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.occupational_info: college student

lenders.name: International Micro Finance Club
lenders.loan_because: We're fortunate to be able to loan and want to thank those who take risks to bring their ideas to life just as we hope someone will take a risk on us when its our turn to make the most of ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We go to school, read books, and study leadership so one day we can influence our neighbors and country to do good in the world around us.

lenders.name: Nutricity.com
lenders.loan_because: We believe in giving back what God has given us.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I personally feel that one of the fundamental reasons for life is giving. If we are fortunate enough to receive then we should give openly to help others. Every entrepreneur starts small and deserves the chance to make a business for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a stationery company that makes everything from wedding invitations to childrens notepads.

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.loan_because: Ideas need a chance!

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to give credit to the courage and passion of the entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Fredrik
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good, being able to help people all over the globe. And when i am feeling good, im in connection with the source, and when im connected with the source, the universe expands, and all things develop. :)
lenders.occupational_info: Im studying Chineese medicine. And i work as a healer.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I know the feeling that comes from owning your own business. The pride that comes from the ability to provide for ones family.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am more than fortunate.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to help people help themselves - and preserves dignity and respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to run an association of heads, principals and other leaders of secondary schools and tertiary colleges.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because:
if anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.
1 John 3:17-18 (New International Version)
lenders.occupational_info: I provide health care in a doctor's office.
